title: [Large-Scale] Science Instrument Integration Learning Design Using Digital Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science concepts and experience with digital device operation
context.additional_context: Learners are preservice teachers exploring methods to design and operate science classes using digital tools in elementary education settings. Through project-based assessment, they develop resource integration strategies applicable to real educational contexts

learning_goals: Learners can design strategies for integrating diverse digital/physical resources in device-enabled science instruction
Learners can analyze instrumental conflicts arising during interactions between tools and propose solutions.
Learners can create project outcomes that effectively teach science concepts difficult to implement without digital resources.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
